physical_appearance: This is an embroidered yoke. It is red and yellow, with silver embroidered geometric patterns. The yellow fabric with silver stitched pattern creates a semicircular collar a the top of the garment. There are no stains seen on the garment.
sgcool_label_text: This is the front of a blouse, or the yoke of a tunic, that would be stitched onto a backing. It is a fine example of 20th century zardozi work, as utilised on clothing in the Sindh region.
subject_terms_1: geometric motifs embroidery (visual works) tunics folk costume
subject_terms_2: Clothing and dress Sindhi (South Asian people) Motifs Embroidery Tunics Ethnic costume
